MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL65 and LL71 postcode areas of Holyhead and Llanerch-y-Medd, affecting properties in Trefor, Carmel and the surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 10:21 am because a grounded overhead cable. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repair required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:42 am on 9th January, 2021.
